name.baseName: Vegetable powder ; Roots and tubers, potatoes, mustard, leafy vegetables, beans, eggplants and fruits, squash, onions and garlic ; Grinding ; All sizes; NESPS2
蔬菜粉 ; 根茎类、薯类、芥菜类、叶菜类、豆类、茄果类、瓜菜类、葱蒜类 ; 碾磨 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程涉及生产蔬菜粉，包括根茎类、薯类、芥菜类、叶菜类、豆类、茄果类、瓜菜类、葱蒜类等不同种类。这些蔬菜的碾磨适用于所有规模的操作。所产生的蔬菜粉可用于烹饪目的、食品加工以及健康和营养产品的添加剂。此外，该过程实施了如静电沉降和袋式过滤器系统等末端管控技术，以管理从PM2.5到PM10范围内的污染颗粒。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1371文件，在完整版文件中第2631页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为蔬菜粉，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isElectrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是静电除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间(天/年)/生产时间(天/年)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间(天/年)/生产时间(天/年)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)is/
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
